questions.question: In this arc, the Straw Hat Pirates help a princess save her kingdom from a Warlord of the Sea who uses sand-based powers. What is...?
This arc takes place on an archipelago near the Red Line and features the separation of the Straw Hat crew. What is...?
Taking place on a ghostly island, this arc introduces a skeleton musician and features battles against zombie-like enemies. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows its user to manipulate and become light. What is...?
This technique, used by Brook, allows him to extract and manipulate the souls of others. What is...?
This power, used by a member of the Big Mom Pirates, allows the user to create and manipulate candy. What is...?
This character, also known as 'God', was the former ruler of Skypiea and wielder of a powerful staff called the 'Goro Goro no Mi'. Who is...?
This leader of the Beasts Pirates, known for his immense strength and Dragon-Dragon Fruit power, is one of the Four Emperors of the Sea. Who is...?
This new character, a skilled samurai and one of the Nine Red Scabbards, is known for their mastery of the Nitoryu style. Who is...?
